main.name: I'm Yrgken koutsi.
main.description: I'm a passionate developer but more importantly I'm passionate about technology
main.bio: I am a recent computer science graduate and self-taught software developer. I enjoy building cool web applications using react and firebase, I also enjoy python for machine learning and deep learning methods mostly for image recognition and image detection techniques. When I am not coding you will find me spending time with my family or going for hiking or playing video games.

resume.skillmessage: Some of my skills are listed below:

education.description: Some of the skilled I developed throught my degree range from web development, mobile applications where I was exposed through technologies such as html,css,javascript,php,sql, and etc. To Big Data Analytics, Computer Visions which invloved technologies in tensorflow, keras, cv2, pandas, numpy, csv, linux, hadoop distribution and etc.

work.title: Lecturer Assistant in web development
work.description: I assisted 1st year students in debugging their code during workshops and resolving any issues that they may had or explain technologies that they did not fully understand during their lectures.

projects.title: LadderNet: Multi-path networks based on U-Net for medical image segmentation
